reasoning: Dental caries measured as prevalence, not incidence. Global prevalence estimated at 2.8% of population with active caries lesions based on WHO epidemiological data. Prevalence of people with caries history is considerably higher (30-40% globally), but active disease prevalence (~2.8%) used here. Metric appropriate for chronic condition.
source: WHO Global Oral Health Status Report; WHO Global Burden of Disease Study estimates
